locale.message: This plugin allows the rearranging of various layout components.

Use the arrows to move the sidebar blocks between the 3 areas. Items in the left area will appear in the left sidebar, items in the right area will appear in the right sidebar and items in the top area will not appear in either sidebar. The small arrows on top and below of the left/right sidebar areas can be used to rearrange the order of the sidebar blocks.

Use the arrows to move the sidebar blocks between the 2 areas. Items in the right area will appear in the right sidebar and items in the left area will not appear anywhere. The arrows on top and below of the areas can be used to rearrange the order of the sidebar blocks.
Switch to a single sidebar (two column layout)
Add a second sidebar (three column layout)
